TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TypeDelegator extends System.Reflection.TypeInfo

summary.span: 包装 对象并将所有方法委托给该 。

span.span: Wraps a object and delegates methods to that .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从此类型派生，并重写必须提供自定义的这些成员加上所需的程序和由尚未实现的任何成员。Derive from this type and override only those members you have to provide customization in, plus any members that are required by your program and not already implemented by . 派生自并实现的大多数属性和方法的。 derives from and implements most of the properties and methods of . 为实现，每个成员自动委托给内部的相应成员对象，它提供作为构造函数的参数。For each member it implements, automatically delegates to the corresponding member of an internal object, which is supplied as an argument to the constructor. 此内部对象公开到派生的类`protected`字段。This internal object is exposed to deriving classes by the `protected` field. > [!NOTE] > 某些成员具有实现，即使这些成员本身只是继承自。Some members of have implementations even though the members themselves are simply inherited from . 在这些情况下，提供了该实现通过重写`protected`具有以"Impl"结尾的名称的方法。In these cases, the implementation is provided by an overridden `protected` method that has a name that ends in "Impl". 例如，对于的所有重载的实现方法提供的重写方法。For example, the implementation for all overloads of the method is supplied by the overridden method. 实现继承属性，例如并提供了通过重写方法。The implementation for inherited properties such as and is provided by the overridden method. 派生类可以提供公共构造函数采用对象作为其参数并只需将该对象传递到构造函数，也可以设置内部以某种其他方式的对象。Deriving classes can provide a public constructor that takes a object as its parameter and simply passes that object to the constructor, or can set the internal object in some other way. 如果派生类将使用由未实现成员，它必须重写该成员并提供一个实现。If a deriving class uses a member that is not implemented by , it must override that member and provide an implementation. 最简单的实现是在内部调用相应的成员对象公开的字段，但你可以提供你的应用程序需要任何实现。The simplest implementation is to call the corresponding member on the internal object exposed by the field, but you can provide any implementation your application requires. 不需要重写这些成员，如果应用程序不使用或的库函数应用程序应调用 (例如，通过构造函数)。It is not necessary to override these members if they are not used by your application or by library functions your application calls (for example, by the constructor). 以下虚拟方法 (`Overridable`方法在 Visual Basic 中的) 的由不实现: ， ， ， ， ， ， , , , , , , .The following virtual methods (`Overridable` methods in Visual Basic) of are not implemented by : , , , , , , , , , , , , . 以下虚拟属性 (`Overridable`在 Visual Basic 中的属性) 的由不实现: ， ， ， ， ， ， , , , .The following virtual properties (`Overridable` properties in Visual Basic) of are not implemented by : , , , , , , , , , .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Assembly As Assembly
public: virtual property System::Reflection::Assembly ^ Assembly { System::Reflection::Assembly ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取已实现类型的程序集。

span.span: Gets the assembly of the implemented type.

value.span: 表示已实现类型的程序集的 对象。

span.span: An object representing the assembly of the implemented type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集是公共语言运行时中的部署单元。Assemblies are the deployment units in the common language runtime. 程序集建立的命名空间解析请求，并确定外部公开的资源，哪些是可以从程序集内访问。Assemblies establish the namespace for resolving requests and determine which resources are exposed externally and which are accessible from within the assembly. 公共语言运行时可以确定，并找到正在运行的任何对象的程序集。The common language runtime can determine and locate the assembly for any running object.

span.span: Gets the assembly's fully qualified name.

value.span: 包含程序集的完全限定名的 。

span.span: A containing the assembly's fully qualified name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property BaseType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ BaseType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前类型的基类型。

span.span: Gets the base type for the current type.
The base type for a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类型是此类型直接从中继承的类型。The base type is the type from which this type directly inherits. 由于类类型是所有其他类型的最基本基类，它是不具有基类型的唯一类型。Since the class type is the ultimate base class of all the other types, it is the only type that does not have a base type. 在这种情况下，`null`的基类型作为返回`Object`类型。In this case, `null` is returned as the base type of the `Object` type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`bindingAttr`的。返回所有公共和非公共字段的非公共。Use a `bindingAttr` of .NonPublic to return all public and nonpublic fields. 使用`BindingFlags.IgnoreCase`忽略的字段的大小写，因为搜索是区分大小写的默认值。Use `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of the fields, as the search is case-sensitive by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不返回字段按特定顺序，如按字母顺序或按声明顺序。The method does not return fields in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 因为该顺序可能会变化，你的代码必须不依赖于字段的返回的顺序。Your code must not depend on the order in which fields are returned, because that order can vary. 使用`bindingAttr`的。返回所有公共和非公共字段的非公共。Use a `bindingAttr` of .NonPublic to return all public and nonpublic fields.

param.name: name
param.span: 要调用的成员的名称。

span.span: This may be a constructor, method, property, or field.

span.span: If an empty string ("") is passed, the default member is invoked.

param.span: 这必须是下列之一：、、、、、、 或 。

span.span: This must be one of the following : , , , , , , or .

param.span: 必须指定合适的调用属性。

span.span: A suitable invocation attribute must be specified.

param.span: 如果要调用静态成员，则必须设置 标志。

span.span: If a static member is to be invoked, the flag must be set.

param.name: binder
param.span: 一个对象，它启用绑定、对参数类型的强制、对成员的调用，以及通过反射对 对象的检索。

param.span: 如果 binder 为 ，则使用默认活页夹。

span.span: If binder is , the default binder is used.

param.span: 请参阅 。

span.span: See .

param.span: 对其调用指定成员的对象。

span.span: The object on which to invoke the specified member.

span.span: An array of type that contains the number, order, and type of the parameters of the member to be invoked.

param.span: 如果 args 包含未初始化的 ，则它被视为空，用默认联编程序可将它扩展为 0、0.0 或一个字符串。

span.span: If args contains an uninitialized , it is treated as empty, which, with the default binder, can be widened to 0, 0.0 or a string.

param.name: modifiers
param.span: 类型的数组，其长度与 args 相同，其元素表示与要调用的成员参数关联的属性。

span.span: An array of type that is the same length as args, with elements that represent the attributes associated with the arguments of the member to be invoked.

param.span: 参数在成员的签名中有与其关联的属性。

span.span: A parameter has attributes associated with it in the member's signature.

param.span: 对于 ByRef，请使用 ；对于空，请使用 。

span.span: For ByRef, use , and for none, use .

param.span: 默认联编程序执行与这些内容的精确匹配。

span.span: The default binder does exact matching on these.

param.span: 和 这样的属性不用于绑定，可以使用 查看它们。

span.span: Attributes such as and are not used in binding, and can be viewed using .

param.name: culture
param.span: 用于控制类型强制的 的实例。

span.span: An instance of used to govern the coercion of types.

param.span: 类型强制在某些情况下是必要的，例如将表示 1000 的字符串转换为 值，因为不同的区域性表示 1000 的方式不同。

span.span: This is necessary, for example, to convert a string that represents 1000 to a value, since 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.

param.span: 如果 culture 为 ，则将 用于当前线程的 。

span.span: If culture is , the for the current thread's is used.

param.name: namedParameters
param.span: 类型的数组，包含与 args 数组匹配的参数名（从元素零开始）。

span.span: An array of type containing parameter names that match up, starting at element zero, with the args array.

param.span: 数组中不能有空缺。

span.span: There must be no holes in the array.

param.span: 如果 args.

span.span: If args.

param.span: 大于 namedParameters.

span.span: is greater than namedParameters.

param.span: ，则按顺序填充剩余的参数。

span.span: , the remaining parameters are filled in order.

summary.span: 调用指定的成员。

span.span: Invokes the specified member.

summary.span: 在指定的活页夹和调用属性的约束下，要调用的方法必须为可访问，并且提供与指定的自变量列表最具体的匹配。

span.span: The method that is to be invoked must be accessible and provide the most specific match with the specified argument list, under the constraints of the specified binder and invocation attributes.

returns.span: 表示被调用成员的返回值的 。

span.span: An representing the return value of the invoked member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以下条件成立，则将调用方法：A method will be invoked if both the following conditions are true: - 方法声明中的参数数量等于指定的参数列表中的参数数目 （除非该成员上定义了默认自变量）。The number of parameters in the method declaration equals the number of arguments in the specified argument list (unless default arguments are defined on the member). - 每个参数的类型可以转换为参数的类型绑定器。The type of each arguments can be converted by the binder to the type of the parameter. 联编程序将查找所有匹配的方法。The binder will find all the matching methods. 这些方法会找到基于请求的绑定类型 (`BindingFlags.MethodInvoke`， `BindingFlags.GetProperties`，依此类推)。These methods are found based upon the type of binding requested (`BindingFlags.MethodInvoke`, `BindingFlags.GetProperties`, and so on). 按名称、 数量的参数，并搜索修饰符联编程序中定义的一组筛选的组的方法。The set of methods is filtered by the name, number of arguments, and a set of search modifiers defined in the binder. 选择该方法后，将调用它。After the method is selected, it will be invoked. 此时，检查可访问性。Accessibility is checked at that point. 搜索可能基于与方法关联的可访问性属性来控制搜索的组的方法。The search may control which set of methods are searched based upon the accessibility attribute associated with the method. 方法负责选择要调用的方法。The method is responsible for selecting the method to be invoked. 默认联编程序选择最精确的匹配。The default binder selects the most specific match. > [!NOTE] > 对于完全受信任的代码将忽略访问限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是说，私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问并完全受信任代码时使用反射来调用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. 目前，`InvokeMember`对 Microsoft.NET Framework 反射语义执行，其中每种类型的对象。Currently, `InvokeMember` performs the Microsoft .NET Framework reflection semantics for every type of object. 如果按名称指定的成员是一个数组和`BindingFlags.GetField`标志设置为开`invokeAttr`，则`args`数组指定其值是要返回的元素。If the member specified by name is an array and the `BindingFlags.GetField` flag is set on `invokeAttr`, the `args` array specifies the elements whose values are to be returned. 例如，以下调用通过`Type`对象`t`返回的字符串数组 MyArray，是调用对象的成员的第一个元素的值：For example, the following call through `Type` object `t` returns the value of the first element of the string array MyArray, which is a member of the calling object: `String ret = (String) t.InvokeMember ("MyArray", BindingFlags.GetField, null, this, new Variant[]{0});` 可以使用`InvokeMember`设置成员数组的一个或多个元素。You can use `InvokeMember` to set one or more elements of a member array. 所有元素都设置为相同的值。All elements are set to the same value. `args`数组的格式设置必须按如下所示：The `args` array must be formatted as follows: ``` {index1, index2,, value} ``` 例如，若要设置 MyArray 的第一个成员上一示例中，语法如下所示：For example, to set the first member of MyArray from the previous example, the syntax is as follows: ```csharp t.InvokeMember ("MyArray", BindingFlags.SetField, null, this, new Variant[]{0,"Updated"}); ```

summary.span: 获取一个标识元数据中的此实体的值。

span.span: Gets a value that identifies this entity in metadata.

value.span: 一个值，与模块一起来唯一标识元数据中的此实体。

span.span: A value which, in combination with the module, uniquely identifies this entity in metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性获取的令牌可以传递到非托管反射 API。The tokens obtained using this property can be passed to the unmanaged reflection API. 有关详细信息，请参阅[非托管反射 API](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8)。For more information, see [Unmanaged Reflection API](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Module As Module
public: virtual property System::Reflection::Module ^ Module { System::Reflection::Module ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含已实现类型的模块。

span.span: Gets the module that contains the implemented type.

value.span: 表示已实现类型的模块的 对象。

span.span: A object representing the module of the implemented type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模块是一个可加载单元，可以包含类型声明和实现。A module is a loadable unit that can contain type declarations and implementations. 模块包含足够的信息来启用公共语言运行时加载该模块时找到所有的实现位。Modules contain enough information to enable the common language runtime to locate all implementation bits when the module is loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取移除了路径的已实现类型的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the implemented type, with the path removed.

value.span: 包含类型的非限定名的 。

span.span: A containing the type's non-qualified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含当前 `TypeDelegator` 名称的字符串。A string containing the name of the current `TypeDelegator`. 返回仅的简单名称，不是完全限定名称。Only the simple name, not the fully qualified name, is returned. 若要获取的名称和路径，请使用。To get the name and the path, use .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Namespace As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取已实现类型的命名空间。

span.span: Gets the namespace of the implemented type.

value.span: 包含类型的命名空间的 。

span.span: A containing the type's namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取包含当前的命名空间的字符串`TypeDelegator`。This property gets a string containing the namespace of the current `TypeDelegator`. 例如，如果`TypeDelegator`是，返回的命名空间是。For example, if the `TypeDelegator` is , the returned namespace is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TypeHandle As RuntimeTypeHandle
public: virtual property RuntimeTypeHandle TypeHandle { RuntimeTypeHandle get(); };

summary.span: 获取已实现类型的内部元数据表示形式的句柄。

span.span: Gets a handle to the internal metadata representation of an implemented type.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型句柄是与每个类型相关联的唯一整数值。A type handle is a unique integer value associated with each type. 在运行时句柄是唯一的。The handle is unique during the runtime.

summary.span: 一个指示类型信息的值。

span.span: A value indicating type information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property UnderlyingSystemType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ UnderlyingSystemType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示已实现类型的基础 。

span.span: Gets the underlying that represents the implemented type.
The underlying type.
